#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
 #define gc getchar_unlocked


void scanint(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

     
    int main()
    {
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    int n; 
    scanint(n);
    long sum=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n/2;i++)
    {
    if(n%i==0)
    sum+=i;
    }
    cout<<sum<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
    }
